title: Launch Configuration
description: Defines the structure of the `launch` property in `deno.json` or the content of `launch.config.json`.

$schema.description: The URL of the JSON schema for this file.

port.description: The default debug port for all launch configurations.

console.description: The default console type to use.

runtimeExecutable.description: The default Deno runtime executable to use.

excludes.description: An array of glob patterns to exclude from all groups.

id.description: A unique identifier for the group, used for merging configurations.

name.description: The display name for the group, used as a base for launch configuration names.

includes.description: An array of glob patterns to include files for this group. Mutually exclusive with `program`.

excludes.description: An array of glob patterns to exclude files from this group.

program.description: The path to a single executable file. Mutually exclusive with `includes`.

runtimeExecutable.description: The runtime executable to use for this group. Overrides the root `runtimeExecutable`.

runtimeArgs.description: An array of arguments to pass to the Deno runtime.

scriptArgs.description: Default arguments to pass to the script.

scripts.description: An array of script variations. Each entry creates a separate launch configuration. An entry can be a string of arguments or an array of arguments.

port.description: The debug port for this group. Overrides the root `port`.

console.description: The console type for this group. Overrides the root `console`.
